CustomField.formula:
/* IF( ISBLANK( Stock_Vehicle_Master__r.Duty_Amount__c ) , Stock_Vehicle_Master__r.Estimated_Duty__c * Forward_Duty_Contract__r.Cover_Percentage__c , Stock_Vehicle_Master__r.Duty_Amount__c * Forward_Duty_Contract__r.Cover_Percentage__c ) */
Stock_Vehicle_Master__r.Estimated_Duty__c * Forward_Duty_Contract__r.Cover_Percentage__c
CustomField.label: Cover Amount - Foreign Curr (Unused)
